pkgmetadata.longdescription: Evapotranspiration Based on FAO Penman-Monteith Equation // Calculation of Evapotranspiration by FAO Penman-Monteith equation based on Allen, R. G., Pereira, L. S., Raes, D., Smith, M. (1998, ISBN:92-5-104219-5) "Crop evapotranspiration - Guidelines for computing crop water requirements - FAO Irrigation and drainage paper 56".
